resources.string:
Answers

Click on the barcode to get it fullscreen and show to the one who needs to see/scan it. If you have no passbook yet - but want to test the app anyway - you could get some from here If you have no idea what this is all about you can have a look at Wikipedia.

Questions

Give feedback in the Google+ Community or you can drop the author a mail. If you like the app rate it on Google Play I also would love to hear stories about where you used this app.

Credits

Thanks to Luis Torrecilla for the Design!

More

This app ist best launched with FAST App Search Tool which is available for free and needs not a single permission!

Legal

This app is not affiliated with Apple - Passbook might be Trademark by Apple, but introduced like a standard so this should be OK

Sorry, but there was a problem processing this Passbook. If you want you can send me this passbook so I can check what the problem is and improve the software.
